name: Community Figma MCP server
tagline: Allow AI Agents to help you with Figma designs!
description: The unofficial Figma Model Context Protocol(MCP) server is a missing link between your AI agent and the Figma design document. Now, AI agents can create, edit, and arrange your Figma design. You can use it together with ChatGPT, Claude Desktop, Cursor, or any other client that supports MCP. The project is free and open source. You don't need anything extra. You use Figma together with your LLM.

name: Clear for Slack
tagline: Clear messages get answered quicker
description: Clear is a Slack app that helps you write clearer, more direct workplace messages. Privacy-first, no message storage, with built-in coaching to help you improve over time.

name: Griply 2026
tagline: Achieve your goals with a goal-oriented task manager
description: Most goals fail because they never translate into daily action. Griply is a goal-oriented task manager that connects your goals, habits, tasks, and calendar in one easy-to-use system. Plan your goals for 2026, break them down into daily actions, schedule time for what matters, and track measurable progress over time with a planner designed around outcomes, not just tasks.

name: HappyMail
tagline: We made email simple again
description: Create your personalized email address in just a few clicks. Choose from hundreds of unique extensions (.actor,artist,chef,doctor...). Simple, secure and professional. Works with all email apps.

name: vibecoder.date
tagline: Find who you vibe with, git commit to love
description: A dating app for vibecoders. Swipe and chat right in VS Code, Cursor, or Windsurf. No tab switching. No context switching. Just vibes. git commit to love.

name: Blober.io
tagline: The easiest way to transfer files between cloud providers.
description: Manage blobs, files and folders across different storage providers. Blober a local-first workflow engine designed to turn "data graveyards" into organized archives.

name: Radial
tagline: Your shortcuts, one gesture away
description: Radial is a modern pie menu for macOS. Create macros that automate repetitive tasks, then trigger them instantly with a single gesture.

name: CalPal
tagline: The notebook calculator that thinks for you (now with AI).
description: Most calculators give you answers but lose the context. CalPal is a literate calculator that combines a text editor with a calculation engine, letting your math tell a story. The standout feature is the BYOK AI Assistant (Gemini). It solves "Blank Page Syndrome"â€”just ask it to "Draft a travel budget" or "Estimate MVP costs," and it generates the line items instantly for you to tweak. It's 100% free, private (local-only data), and browser-based.

name: Supaguard
tagline: Scan, Detect & Protect Your Supabase Data
description: Iâ€™ve seen many Supabase apps accidentally expose PII, PCI, or hardcoded keys. Itâ€™s easy to miss and expensive to fix. So I built Supaguard â€” it scans your app in minutes and shows exactly whatâ€™s exposed. â€¢ No setup, just connect â€¢ Detects PII, PCI & API keys â€¢ Instant alerts Launch offer: 2 free scans + 35% New Year discount ðŸ‘‰ supaguard.pro Feedback welcome â€” built to help devs stay safe without headaches.

name: Reword
tagline: Rewrite messages without leaving your workflow
description: Reword is a message rewriting tool that lets you rewrite messages without leaving your workflow. Get smart replies without switching apps. A macOS menu bar writing app, also available on iOS and Android.

name: MoovAI
tagline: Launch viral AI ads & pro social content in minutes
description: Stop hiring expensive actors. Moovai leverages Kling AI to generate ultra-realistic UGC video ads that look like they were filmed on an iPhone. Need pro visuals? Our Nano Banana Pro integration transforms any shot into high-end lifestyle photos or high-CTR thumbnails for Instagram & YouTube. Why Moovai? Kling AI Video: Realistic movement & physics. Pro Lifestyle Images: Studio quality in seconds. Built for Ads: Optimized for TikTok & Meta.

name: Timelines 4
tagline: Track your time to achieve your New Year's resolutions.
description: Track your time on an interactive timeline, see where itâ€™s going, and find more time for the things you care about. This is great also for reaching your New Year resolutions. Timelines 4 brings easier management and tracking of subcategories, combined goals, improved Live Activity and Shortcuts integration, and more.

name: Resell AI
tagline: Reselling workflow with market-based price suggestions
description: Save Hours using AI Price Evaluations to sell your products in Seconds, track your Progress and view the most sold Items on marketplaces like Vinted

name: 70Lives â€“ Beauty Business App
tagline: Smart pricing, real-time tax clarity & expense tracking
description: 70Lives is the all-in-one business app built for self-employed beauty professionals. Track income, expenses and receipts instantly. See real-time tax estimates and price treatments accurately. AI features include OCR receipt scanning and voice-to-text entry to log sales and costs effortlessly. Built by a tax professional for lash techs, nail techs, MUAs, PMU artists and salons - not a generic bookkeeping software!

name: SoftReveal â€” Reveal less. Engage more.
tagline: Hide Content, Reveal on Click
description: When you record your screen, everything shows up immediately. And thatâ€™s the problem. SoftReveal is a tiny web tool that lets you blur parts of an image and reveal them only when you click â€” perfect for creators who want to control when information appears, not just what appears. No timelines. No video editor. Just paste, blur, click, and record.

name: Immerziva
tagline: Transform reading into a cinematic experience with audio
description: Immerziva transforms the way you read stories. We combine literature with immersive audio - ambient sounds, soundtracks, and sound effects - all synchronized with your reading pace. For Readers: - Immersive reading with synchronized audio - Ambient sounds that match the story mood - Sound effects triggered by key moments For Authors: - Publish your stories for free - Add immersive audio layers to chapters - Real-time engagement analytics - Build your reader community

name: feynn.ai
tagline: Structured intelligence, powered by AI
description: feynn.ai is an AI-powered strategic intelligence platform that turns complex questions into structured research, scenario analysis, and decision-grade insights. Built for leaders and teams who need clarity, not noise.

name: AI Studio - Model Photoshoots, No Studio
tagline: Create Professional Photoshoots & Visuals Without a Studio
description: Create professional photoshoots and visuals without a studio. AI Studio helps fashion brands generate stunning on-model product images in seconds. From clothing to accessories, create high-quality AI photoshoots that highlight designs, speed up product launches, and keep a consistent brand look â€” all without expensive studio setups. â€¢ Fashion Photography â€¢ Accessories Photography â€¢ Product Photography â€¢ Marketing & Ad Visuals AI Studio is built for modern brands.

name: Careerfinder â€“ AI Career Roadmap
tagline: Find the right career path in minutes
description: Choosing a career is confusing for students. Advice is often generic, biased, or outdated. Careerfinder helps students find the right career path using AI by analysing their interests, strengths, and goals. It generates a personalised career roadmap with suitable roles, skills to build, and clear next steps. Already used by 100+ students in production to gain career clarity.

name: DataWizard App
tagline: AI Data Analyst for SMEs. Instant Insights from CSV & Excel.
description: DataWizard is an AI-powered data analyst for all SMEs. Upload CSV or Excel files, ask questions in plain English, and get instant charts, KPIs, and actionable insights. No hallucinations. No SQL. Just the mathematical truth your business needs.
